import React from 'react' import { Card, CardBody, ButtonGroup, Button } from 'reactstrap'; import styles from './Products.module.css' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import CartSvg from '../../assets/icons/cart.svg' function ListItem({ item }) { const history = useHistory() const handleCartClick = (e)=>{ e.stopPropagation() props.addItemToCart(data) } return ( history.replace("/products/" + item.slug)}>
{item.title}

{item.description}

 ) } export default ListItem
